select u.USERID, u.LOGINNAME, u.PASSWORD, u.USERNAME, u.ROLE, u.USERSTATE, u.REMARK from test_user u where u.LOGINNAME = #{LOGINNAME} and u.USERSTATE = '00'
and u.PASSWORD = #{PASSWORD}

select u.USERID, u.LOGINNAME, u.PASSWORD, u.USERNAME, u.ROLE, u.USERSTATE, u.REMARK from test_user u where u.LOGINNAME != 'admin'
and u.LOGINNAME like CONCAT('%',#{LOGINNAME},'%')
and u.USERNAME like CONCAT('%',#{USERNAME},'%')
